title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Furniture Placement", 1934–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
description: Furniture placement for sitting room (?) of Lady Esther Yacht. Double-door entrance on left wall. Two-seat sofa with box-frame on left side of right wall. Upholstered back and seat, slightly reclined back cushions. Flat armrest with curved underside in middle of sofa between two seats, extending from back. Shallow shelf behind sofa, turns to the right to enclose sofa and forms partition/wall of stairwell. At right of partition, three tubular railings extend horizontally from side and connect to floor at entrance to descending stairwell. Rectangular window on wall above stairwell, and window on wall above sofa. Windows with horizontal blinds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Furniture Placement", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-307.
